name: Stink Out 2 the lüftening
description:
In Stink Out you move from wall to wall there is no inbetween. Push stinky zombies and cats to the windows so they no longer provide thick air to you clean apartment.

They are also pretty nasty items the zombies left in the room so gross... Put them in your shit bag and throw that stinky stuff out of your window.

It's the exciting mix between the puzzle and the chaotic platformer kind of game.
